mapper.insert: INSERT INTO msg (room_no, mar_no, buyer_no, buyer_name, message, seller_no, seller_name) VALUES (#{roomNo}, #{marNo}, #{buyerNo}, #{buyerName}, #{message}, #{sellerNo}, #{sellerName})
INSERT INTO chat_room (mar_no, seller_no, buyer_no) VALUES (#{marNo}, #{sellerNo}, #{buyerNo})
mapper.select: SELECT room_no, seller_no, seller_name, buyer_no, buyer_name, DATE_FORMAT(send_dt, '%H:%i') AS send_dt, message FROM msg WHERE room_no = #{roomNo} ORDER BY msg_no

SELECT a.room_no, a.seller_no, a.buyer_no, a.mar_no, b.nick_name, b.addr1, b.addr2 FROM chat_room AS a JOIN user AS b ON a.seller_no = b.user_no WHERE buyer_no = #{buyerNo} OR seller_no = #{buyerNo} ORDER BY room_no DESC;
SELECT mar_title, mar_price FROM market WHERE mar_no = #{marNo}
